name: Nodejs
author: harumi@harumi.io.vn
startup: if [[ ! -z $ALVKT(NODE_PACKAGES) ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install $ALVKT(NODE_PACKAGES); fi; if [[ ! -z $ALVKT(UNNODE_PACKAGES) ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm uninstall $ALVKT(UNNODE_PACKAGES); fi; if [[ '$ALVKT(JS_FILE)' == '*.js' ]]; then /usr/local/bin/node '/home/container/$ALVKT(JS_FILE)' $ALVKT(NODE_ARGS); else /usr/local/bin/npx --yes tsx '/home/container/$ALVKT(JS_FILE)' $ALVKT(NODE_ARGS); fi
